quotes.quote: I have no regrets. I wouldn't have lived my life the way I did if I was going to worry about what people were going to say.
There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
I have no regrets because I know I did my best -- all I could do.
I've no regrets. You take responsibility for your actions.
Work hard, do your best, live the truth, trust yourself, have some fun...and you'll have no regrets.
I have no regrets. Regrets are meaningless. You can't change yesterday or tomorrow. You can change only this present moment.
There's no point in regretting things. If you can't do the time, don't do the crime. Life's too short to worry about things I've said.
At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can't build on it; it's only good for wallowing in.
No regrets. No looking back. Just hold onto life and move forward. We have no way of knowing what lies ahead...and that is what makes the journey even more exciting.
I have no regrets. I will never regret loving someone because the feeling of love for five minutes is greater than an eternity of hurt.
Never regret. IF IT'S GOOD, It's wonderful. IF IT'S BAD, IT'S experience.
At the end of the day let their be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
Never look back and regret, look back and smile at what you have learned.
I don't dwell in the past; I don't wallow in old events and emotions. I don't waste time on regret. No use going over and over the details of what already happened.
I don't have time for regrets, only fun.
I have no regrets. I don't believe in looking back. What I am proudest of? Working really hard... and achieving as much as I could.
Accept everything about yourself - I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end - no apologies, no regrets.
I never regret anything. Because every little detail of your life is what made you into who you are in the end.
Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
We should have no regrets. ... The past is finished. There is nothing to be gained by going over it. Whatever it gave us in the experiences it brought us was something we had to know.
Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
Regret for time wasted can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
In looking back, I see nothing to regret and little to correct.
Regrets and recriminations only hurt your soul.
Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
